hero.title: Monitor Your Farm's Health
hero.description: Track animal health metrics, get insights, and improve farm productivity with our all-in-one mobile app and dashboard.

features.title: Comprehensive Farm Health Monitoring
features.description: Our app collects critical data points to give you a complete picture of your animals' health and farm conditions.

urineTracking.title: Urine pH Tracking
urineTracking.description: Monitor and analyze urine pH levels to ensure optimal digestive health and prevent metabolic disorders.

fecalScoring.title: Fecal Scoring
fecalScoring.description: Track and analyze fecal consistency to detect early signs of digestive problems or parasitic infections.

temperatureMonitoring.title: Temperature Monitoring
temperatureMonitoring.description: Record and track body temperatures to quickly identify potential illnesses or infections.

bodyCondition.title: Body Condition Scoring
bodyCondition.description: Assess and monitor the body condition of your animals to optimize nutrition and health outcomes.

benefits.title: Benefits for Your Farm Operation
benefits.description: Our solution helps you maintain optimal animal health while improving your farm's profitability and sustainability.

earlyDetection.title: Early Disease Detection
earlyDetection.description: Identify health issues before they become serious problems by tracking vital metrics.

increaseProductivity.title: Increase Productivity
increaseProductivity.description: Optimize animal health to improve growth rates, milk production, and reproductive performance.

reduceCosts.title: Reduce Costs
reduceCosts.description: Decrease veterinary expenses and medication costs through preventive health monitoring.

dataDecisions.title: Data-Driven Decisions
dataDecisions.description: Make informed management choices based on actual health metrics and insights.

timeEfficiency.title: Time Efficiency
timeEfficiency.description: Save hours tracking and analyzing animal health with our automated reporting.

trendAnalysis.title: Trend Analysis
trendAnalysis.description: Identify patterns over time to optimize nutrition, environment, and management practices.

callToAction.title: Ready to Transform Your Farm's Health Management?
callToAction.description: Join thousands of farmers who are using data-driven insights to improve animal health and farm productivity.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: MeasureMe ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how your the information about your famr is collected, used, and disclosed by BDMetrics. This Privacy Policy applies to our website and mobile application, alongside our associated subdomains (collectively, our "Service").

informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
informationCollected.content: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us, including:
items: Account information (e.g., name, email address, username, password)
Farm information (e.g., farm name, location, size)
Animal health metrics (e.g., temperature, urine pH levels, body condition scores)
Usage data (e.g., how you interact with our app)

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, operate, and maintain our application
Improve, personalize, and expand our application
Understand and analyze how you use our application
Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
Communicate with you about updates and other information

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal data, including:
items: The right to access personal data we hold about you
The right to request correction of inaccurate data
The right to request deletion of your data

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
